attributes.action: Legislate to Prohibit Members from standing for the office of Speaker who have ever been a Government Minister or an opposition front bench spokesman
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Holding the office of Speaker is an honour and priviledge that should be only awarded to long standing back bench members of the highest integrity.

Any member who has served as either a government minister or opposition front bench spokesman is likely to favour their political party and be could be regarded as a stooge candidate and possibly tainted by previously holding political office.
